column5: Went out along Oro today.  Left the sled at home and walked.  Fishing was good in 75-80fow, actually best this year.  Managed 4 trout and 6 whites from 8-12 in the am.  Missed a few others.  A small Williams snagged the first fish so I put on a Lil’Foxee Jigging Minnow – looks like a Meggs (perch coloured then a white one).  Tipped it with the tail-end of a Gulp minnow. Fished on bottom: small lifts with the occasional high lift of the lure.   Good way to end on Simcoe. The fog rolled in around 9 and stayed until I left.  Lake trout were full of smelt. Ice was great.  Already looking forward to next year.  Now on to rivers and bows. Cheers
Thanks for the report!  p.s. we love pics!
I had to read everything twice..part of your title says "the fish were angry my friend"  maybe "hungry" instead.
Did better than I.  Maybe I moved around too much. Good stuff
Better than me too, I was also out at Oro. Landed only one Whitie, it was also tough for guys around us. Can't wait till next season!
i too was in oro but only got out from 11:15 until 1:15. got 3 lakers.  Nice day and as you say it was good fishing. Congrats on a fishfilled day
